MonsterTrait.Name: Amphibious
MonsterTrait.Text: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

MonsterTrait.Name: Otherwordly Perception
MonsterTrait.Text: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

MonsterTrait.Name: Slippery
MonsterTrait.Text: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The kuo-toa is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): sacred flame, thaumaturgy • 1st level (3 slots): bane, shield of faith

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The kuo-toa makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its pincer staff.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Pincer Staff
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't use its pincer staff on another target.
